0.8.name: wordpress/everytrail-shortcode-simple-embed
0.8.description:
With this shortcode, you're able to embed a google map from the website everytrail.com. Just enter the url or the trip_id and it's done.

Shortcodename

Use: wi_everytrail

Example

  1. [wi_everytrail url="123456"]
  2. [wi_everytrail url="http://www.everytrail.com/view_trip.php?trip_id=xxxx"]
  3. [wi_everytrail]123456[/wi_everytrail]
  4. [wi_everytrail]http://www.everytrail.com/view_trip.php?trip_id=123456[/wi_everytrail]

Custom Parameters:

  • width: Default:400. You can chosse the width of your iframe
  • title: Defaut: short take title from everytrail website. You can overwrite that with title="WhatYouWant"
